properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:46PM PST until January 18 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 8 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph late tonight
and Saturday morning.

* WHERE...Cascades in Lane County.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Expect snow covered road surfaces. Travel could be
very difficult at times over mountain passes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
